DOC.brief_summary: To compare the first and second recovery assessments on Replenine®-VF and to evaluate recovery of different batches if patients changed batches during the study. To evaluate Replenine®-VF in terms of long-term clinical efficacy, tolerance and safety
DOC.brief_title: An Open Study to Investigate the Safety and Efficacy of Replenine®-VF in Severe Haemophilia B Patients
DOC.criteria: Previously treated patients At least 12 years of age Severe Haemophilia B and without inhibitor to factor IX
